column5: The WOW factor! This has it. *Monthly Special - Whole house for 30 days for the price of 2.5 weeks! (plus no 14% hotel tax) *30 day+ stays required. Magnificent view of Lake Travis. 3500 sf. Over 2000sf of outdoor living area. PRIVATE Resort style pool. The house & pool really do have a resort feel. Views from every room. Palm trees, plantation shutters, columns, over 15 patio doors opening to the patios for a full, outdoor resort feel .
column8: Tuscan Resort on Lake Travis Great views
